Question
========

On a certain hospital ward, the number of men and women present on the 
first day of the month is tracked for a year. The \"number of men\" is 
a variable measured at the

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level
* Ordinal measurement level
* Interval measurement level
* Ratio measurement level

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level: Incorrect
* Ordinal measurement level: Incorrect
* Interval measurement level: Incorrect
* Ratio measurement level: Correct
